thread.title: FACEBOOK SCAM SENDS PRODUCT TO CUSTOMER & FORCES HER TO PAY
thread.title_full: FACEBOOK SCAM SENDS PRODUCT TO CUSTOMER & FORCES HER TO PAY

author: farhan
title: FACEBOOK SCAM SENDS PRODUCT TO CUSTOMER & FORCES HER TO PAY
text:
FACEBOOK SCAM SENDS PRODUCT TO CUSTOMER & FORCES HER TO PAY   Wed, 22/02/2017 - 8:41am 
Greetings! 
I was just browsing Facebook when I saw a product that looks interesting, I read about it and I was nearly to purchase the item but then I don't have the right paying mode for the item, because of that I did not purchased nor confirmed to buy the item. Advertisement 
This afternoon to my surprise, our building "nator" handed a parcel which was the item I saw in Facebook but I never ordered. 
I was so shocked on how come they sent the item without my confirmation or full payment for instance so for me to expect for the item and pay. 
To my worry it is stated in the invoice sent together with the product that if I don't pay for the said product, they will set reminders if I will not pay. 
How come is this happening while they just ask was to sign up for free information as that about their product but not to used for blackmail as sending items not ordered and they will expect payment instantly as that?! 
Jubilo A.S.S. Contributor
